mapper.select: select si.*,li.name as lession_name from studio_info si join lession_info li on li.id=si.lession_id where si.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND si.user_id=#{userId} AND pointer is not null order by create_time desc
select * from studio_info where id=#{id} and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
select * from studio_info where lession_id=#{lessionId} and user_id=#{userId} and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.update: update studio_info set del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} where id=#{id}
